languages.text: "Паутина, в которой стоит Комморра, хрупка — рябь вуали способна нарушить ее границы и вызвать дизъюнкцию, прорыв Сай'лантреш на улицы Комморры. Каждое такое событие — испытание, что ослабляет Темный город, и потому те, кто способен пронзать вуаль, под запретом на шпилях. Конечно, есть безумцы, пытающиеся использовать Дизъюнкцию для того, чтобы во вспыхнувшем хаосе сразить конкурентов и продвинуться в пищевой цепочке наверх... похоже, Иремерисс решила не ждать удобного случая, а сотворить его сама!"

"The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"
languages.original_text: "Паутина, в которой стоит Комморра, хрупка — рябь вуали способна нарушить ее границы и вызвать дизъюнкцию, прорыв Сай'лантреш на улицы Комморры. Каждое такое событие — испытание, что ослабляет Темный город, и потому те, кто способен пронзать вуаль, под запретом на шпилях. Конечно, есть безумцы, пытающиеся использовать Дизъюнкцию для того, чтобы во вспыхнувшем хаосе сразить конкурентов и продвинуться в пищевой цепочке наверх... похоже, Иремерисс решила не ждать удобного случая, а сотворить его сама!"

traits.locale_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause the Disjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to use the Disjunction an the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It looks like Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity but to create one herself!"

languages.text: « La Toile sur laquelle Commorragh est établie est fragile. Une simple ondulation dans le voile peut briser ses frontières et entraîner une disjonction, permettant une incursion de Sai'lanthresh dans les rues de la Cité Crépusculaire. Chacune de ces attaques affaiblit la ville, et ceux qui sont capables de percer le voile sont donc bannis des tours. Évidemment, il y a toujours des cinglés qui tentent de profiter de ces disjonctions pour éliminer la concurrence et grimper les échelons... Et Yremeryss semble avoir décidé de prendre les choses en main au lieu d'attendre qu'une opportunité se présente à elle ! »
languages.original_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"

Une simple ondulation dans le voile peut briser ses frontières et entraîner une disjonction, permettant une incursion de Sai'lanthresh dans les rues de la Cité Crépusculaire. Chacune de ces attaques affaiblit la ville, et ceux capables de percer le voile sont donc bannis des tours. Évidemment, il y a toujours des cinglés qui tentent de profiter de ces disjonctions pour éliminer la concurrence et grimper les échelons... Et Yremeryss semble avoir décidé de prendre les choses en main au lieu d'attendre qu'une opportunité se présente à elle ! »

languages.text: “科摩罗的网道非常脆弱。一旦屏障发生扰动，边界就会被打破。黑暗之城会发生分裂，赛·兰斯雷什也会侵入到街道上。每当发生这样的事情，黑暗之城都会面临巨大的挑战。因此，所有有能力穿越屏障的人都禁止进入尖塔。当然，也会有一群疯子会抓住分裂与混乱的机会消灭敌人，向食物链的顶端爬上去……看来，伊芮梅莉斯已经不打算继续等待机会了，她打算自己创造机会！”
languages.original_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"

traits.locale_text: “科摩罗的网道非常脆弱。一旦屏障发生扰动，边界就会被打破。黑暗之城会发生分裂，赛·兰斯雷什也会侵入到街道上。每当发生这样的事情，黑暗之城都会面临巨大的挑战。因此，所有有能力穿越屏障的人都禁止进入尖塔。当然，也会有一群疯子会抓住分裂与混乱的机会消灭敌人，向食物链的顶端爬上去……看来，伊芮梅莉斯已经不打算继续等待机会了，她打算自己创造机会！”

languages.text: 「コモラフが存在する網辻はもろいんだ。ヴェールの波紋は境界を破り、セランスレッシュの街中への侵入を許す『分裂』を引き起こす。こういった事象は仄暗き都を弱体化させるため、ヴェールを突き破ることができる者は尖塔への立ち入りを禁じられている。もちろん、分裂やそれに伴う渾沌を利用してライバルを倒し、食物連鎖の上に立とうとするイカれた連中もいるがな…どうやらイレメリスは機会を待つのではなく、それを自ら作ろうと決めたようだ」
languages.original_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフが存在する網辻はもろいんだ。ヴェールの波紋は境界を破り、セランスレッシュの街中への侵入を許す“分裂”を引き起こす。こういった事象は仄暗き都を弱体化させるため、ヴェールを突き破ることができる者は尖塔への立ち入りを禁じられている。もちろん、分裂やそれに伴う渾沌を利用してライバルを倒し、食物連鎖の上に立とうとするイカれた連中もいるがな…どうやらイレメリスは機会を待つのではなく、それを自ら作ろうと決めたようだ」

languages.text: "Das Netz der Tausend Tore, in dem sich Commorragh befindet, ist instabil. Wird es von einer Welle des Schleiers erfasst, können seine Grenzen durchbrochen werden und eine Disjunktion verursachen, dann bricht Sai'lanthreshs Verderbnis über die Straßen herein. Immer wenn das eintritt, ist das für die Dunkle Stadt die reinste Tortur und schwächt sie. Alle, die es schaffen, den Schleier zu überwinden, werden aus den Türmen verbannt. Aber natürlich gibt es Wahnsinnige, die eine solche Disjunktion und das darauffolgende Chaos für sich ausnutzen, um ihre Konkurrenten zu bezwingen und so in der Nahrungskette aufzusteigen ... Es ist wohl so, dass Yremeryss beschlossen hat, nicht auf irgendeine Gelegenheit zu warten, sondern sie selbst zu schaffen!"
languages.original_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"

Wird es von einer Welle des Schleiers erfasst, können seine Grenzen durchbrochen werden und eine Disjunktion verursachen, dann bricht Sai'lanthreshs Verderbnis über die Straßen herein. Immer wenn das eintritt, ist das für die Dunkle Stadt die reinste Tortur und schwächt sie. Alle, die es schaffen, den Schleier zu überwinden, werden aus den Türmen verbannt. Aber natürlich gibt es Wahnsinnige, die eine solche Disjunktion und das darauffolgende Chaos für sich ausnutzen, um ihre Konkurrenten zu bezwingen und so in der Nahrungskette aufzusteigen ... Es ist wohl so, dass Yremeryss beschlossen hat, nicht auf irgendeine Gelegenheit zu warten, sondern sie selbst zu schaffen!"

languages.text: «La Telaraña en la que reside Commorragh es frágil. Una onda en el velo puede rasgar sus confines y causar una disyunción, una incursión de Sai'lanthresh en las calles. Cada vez que se produce una de estas catástrofes, la Ciudad Siniestra se debilita; por eso se expulsa de las torres a quienes son capaces de penetrar ese velo. Pero claro, siempre hay dementes que tratan de aprovechar las disyunciones y el caos resultante para eliminar a la competencia y ascender por la cadena alimenticia... ¡Y parece que Yremeryss ha decidido no esperar más y ha optado por provocar una ella misma!».
languages.original_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"

traits.locale_text: «La Telaraña en la que reside Commorragh es frágil. Una onda en el velo puede rasgar sus confines y causar una disyunción, una incursión de Sai'lanthresh en las calles. Cada vez que se produce una de estas catástrofes, la Ciudad Siniestra se debilita; por eso se expulsa de las torres a quienes son capaces de penetrar ese velo. Pero claro, siempre hay dementes que tratan de aprovecharse de las disyunciones y del caos resultante para eliminar a la competencia y ascender por la cadena alimenticia... ¡Parece que Yremeryss ha decidido no esperar más y ha optado por provocar una ella misma!».

languages.text: "Commorragh'ın yer aldığı Ağyol narindir. Örtünün hafifçe dalgalanmasıyla Ağyol'un sınırları delinip bir ayrışıma sebep olarak Sai'lanthresh'in istila etmesine yol açabilir. Her ayrışım, Kara Şehir'i zayıflatan bir çiledir... Bu yüzden de örtüyü delebilenlerin kulelere girmesi yasaktır. Elbette ayrışımlardan ve çıkan kaostan istifade rakiplerini alaşağı edip güç kazanmaya çalışan deliler de çıkmıyor değil... Demek ki Yremeryss, böyle bir fırsat çıkmasını beklemektense kendi fırsatını yaratmaya karar vermiş!"
languages.original_text: "The Webway in which Commorragh resides is fragile. A ripple of the veil can breach its boundaries and cause a dysjunction, an incursion of Sai'lanthresh into the streets. Each such occasion is an ordeal that weakens the Dark City, and so those capable of piercing the veil are banned from the spires. Of course, there are madmen who try to exploit any dysjunction and the ensuing chaos to take down competitors and move up the food chain... It appears that Yremeryss decided not to wait for an opportunity, but to make it happen herself!"

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ın yer aldığı Ağyol narindir. Örtünün hafifçe dalgalanmasıyla Ağyol'un sınırları delinip bir ayrışıma sebep olarak Sai'lanthresh'in istila etmesine yol açabilir. Her ayrışım, Kara Şehri zayıflatan bir çiledir... Bu yüzden de örtüyü delebilenlerin kulelere girmesi yasaktır. Elbette ayrışımlardan ve çıkan kaostan istifade rakiplerini alaşağı edip güç kazanmaya çalışan deliler de çıkmıyor değil... Demek ki Yremeryss böyle bir fırsat çıkmasını beklemektense kendi fırsatını yaratmaya karar vermiş!"
